description: Today we're introducing you to one of our buddy Mike's recruits from the Covert Missions series. Today we're bringing you Jared and we're giving you a double dose of this new recruit as Mike puts him through the ringer two nights in a row.In the first solo we learn that Jared is 24-years old, doesn't have any trouble pulling the pussy and he's motivated by money. His hobbies include diving, rock climbing and jerking off. He also likes to drink and fuck until his dick gets raw and Mike is happy to hear it. What I noticed most about Jared (aside from the fact that he calls himself Cory) is that beautiful baby face and those kissable lips. He's a husky guy with a nice cock and a friendly enough personality. It won't be long though and Mike will have corrupted this sweet country boy. Your first clue comes in the first solo where Jared is all about fingering and playing with his ass.Now I was sure all these years that I was the crown-wearing bullshitter of all time, but the more I listen to Mike lay it on thick with these boys, the less inclined I am to think I claim the title. Mike hangs on their every last word, searching for his quickest way in. Lucky for us, he usually finds it.
title: Jared, Scene #01
